Trigger.Name: Vice And Virtue
Trigger.RegularExpression: 14:(?<id>[\w]{4}):Eden Prime starts using Vice And Virtue

Trigger.Name: Spear of Paradise (Tank Buster)
Trigger.RegularExpression: 14:3D88:Eden Prime starts using Spear Of Paradise

Trigger.Name: Guardian of Paradise: Mana Boost
Trigger.RegularExpression: 14:3D8D:Guardian Of Paradise starts using Mana Boost

Trigger.Name: Dark Fire III (Spread)
Trigger.RegularExpression: 1A:.{8}:(?<name>(?<player>[\w-']+) [\w-']+) gains the effect of Spell-In-Waiting: Dark Fire III from .* for (?<timer>[\d.]+) Seconds

Trigger.Name: Flare
Trigger.RegularExpression: 1A:.{8}:(?<name>(?<player>[\w-']+) [\w-']+) gains the effect of Spell-In-Waiting: Flare from .* for (?<timer>[\d.]+) Seconds

Trigger.Name: Shadoweye (Petrification)
Trigger.RegularExpression: 1A:.{8}:(?<name>(?<player>[\w-']+) [\w-']+) gains the effect of Spell-In-Waiting: Shadoweye from .* for (?<timer>[\d.]+) Seconds

Trigger.Name: Unholy Darkness (Stack)
Trigger.RegularExpression: 1A:.{8}:(?<name>(?<player>[\w-']+) [\w-']+) gains the effect of Spell-In-Waiting: Unholy Darkness from .* for (?<timer>[\d.]+) Seconds

Trigger.Name: Hell Wind (Prey)
Trigger.RegularExpression: 1A:.{8}:(?<name>(?<player>[\w-']+) [\w-']+) gains the effect of Spell-In-Waiting: Hell Wind from .* for (?<timer>[\d.]+) Seconds

Trigger.Name: Buff Tracker
Trigger.RegularExpression: 1[AE]:.{8}:Voidwalker (?<buff>gains|loses) the effect of Spell-In-Waiting from Voidwalker

Trigger.Name: SpellList
Trigger.RegularExpression: 1A:.{8}:[\w-' ]+ gains the effect of Spell-In-Waiting: (?<spell>Dark Fire III|Flare|Hell Wind|Shadoweye|Unholy Darkness) from .* for [\d.]+ Seconds

Trigger.Name: Hand of Erebos - Empty Hate
Trigger.RegularExpression: 14:3E59:The Hand Of Erebos starts using Empty Hate

Trigger.Name: Hand of Erebos - Empty Rage
Trigger.RegularExpression: 14:3E6B:The Hand Of Erebos starts using Empty Rage

Trigger.Name: Water Debuff
Trigger.RegularExpression: 1A:.{8}:(?<name>(?<player>[\w-']+) [\w-']+) gains the effect of (?<waters>Scouring|Smothering|Splashing|Sundering|Surging|Sweeping|Swirling) Waters from .* for (?<timer>[\d]+)
Trigger.Description: Waters: Scouring = Defamation Smothering = Shared Stack Splashing = Cleanse Debuff Sundering = Wave Knockback Surging = Initial Knockback Sweeping = Cone Swirling = Donut

Trigger.Name: Smothering
Trigger.RegularExpression: 1A:.{8}:(?<name>(?<player>[\w-']+) [\w-']+) gains the effect of Smothering Waters from .* for (?<timer>[\d]+)

Trigger.Name: Surging
Trigger.RegularExpression: 1A:.{8}:(?<name>(?<player>[\w-']+) [\w-']+) gains the effect of Surging Waters from .* for (?<timer>[\d]+)
Trigger.Description: Waters: Scouring = Defamation Smothering = Shared Stack Splashing = Cleanse Debuff Sundering = Wave Knockback Surging = Initial Knockback Sweeping = Cone Swirling = Donut

Trigger.Name: BombListX
Trigger.RegularExpression: 03:.{8}:Added new combatant Bomb Boulder\. Job: N\/A Level: 80 Max HP: 14800000 Max MP: 10000 Pos: \((?<bombx>[\d]+),[\d]+,[\w-.]+\)

Trigger.Name: Voice of the Land
Trigger.RegularExpression: 14:4114:Titan starts using Voice Of The Land

Trigger.Name: Dual Earthen Fists (Knockback)
Trigger.RegularExpression: 14:4135:Titan Maximum starts using Dual Earthen Fists

Trigger.Name: Wyrmclaw
Trigger.RegularExpression: 1A:.{8}:(?<player>[\w-' ]+) gains the effect of Wyrmclaw from for (?<time>[\d]{2})

Trigger.Name: Wyrmfang
Trigger.RegularExpression: 1A:.{8}:(?<player>[\w-' ]+) gains the effect of Wyrmfang from for (?<time>[\d]{2})
